javadoc:
Utility class with methods to get comment information that can be displayed in the
 end of line comment field. A DisplayableEol is associated with a code unit.
 The DisplayableEol gets information for the EOL comment field, which can show the
 End of Line comment for the code unit, the Repeatable comment for the code unit,
 any repeatable comments for the code units that this code unit has references to, and
 possibly a comment indicating the data at a code unit that is referenced by this code unit.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new DisplayableEol.
@param cu code unit that may have end of line or repeatable comments.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: cu
params.comment: code unit that may have end of line or repeatable comments.

methods.javadoc: Return whether the associated code unit has an end of line comment.
methods.name: hasEOL
methods.comment: Return whether the associated code unit has an end of line comment.

methods.javadoc: Return whether the associated code unit has a repeatable comment.
methods.name: hasRepeatable
methods.comment: Return whether the associated code unit has a repeatable comment.

methods.javadoc:
Return whether any memory reference from this code unit has a repeatable
 comment at the reference's to address.
methods.name: hasReferencedRepeatable
methods.comment:
Return whether any memory reference from this code unit has a repeatable
 comment at the reference's to address.

methods.javadoc:
Return whether this code unit has an automatic comment.
 (i.e. any memory reference from this code unit has a
 function defined at the reference's to address, or if the to
 address is a pointer.)
methods.name: hasAutomatic
methods.comment:
Return whether this code unit has an automatic comment.
 (i.e. any memory reference from this code unit has a
 function defined at the reference's to address, or if the to
 address is a pointer.)

methods.javadoc: Return all the comments (End of Line, Repeatable, Referenced Repeatables, and Referenced Data).
methods.name: getComments
methods.comment: Return all the comments (End of Line, Repeatable, Referenced Repeatables, and Referenced Data).

methods.javadoc:
Gets the end of line comment as an array.
@return the EOL comment
methods.name: getEOLComments
methods.comment: Gets the end of line comment as an array.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the repeatable comment as an array.
@return the repeatable comment.
methods.name: getRepeatableComments
methods.comment: Gets the repeatable comment as an array.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the number of repeatable comments at the "to reference"s
@return the number of reference repeatable comments
methods.name: getReferencedRepeatableCommentsCount
methods.comment: Gets the number of repeatable comments at the "to reference"s

return.comment: the number of reference repeatable comments

methods.name: getReferencedRepeatableComments
methods.comment: Gets a referenced repeatable comment as a RefRepeatComment object.

params.name: index
params.comment:
indicator of which referenced repeatable comment is desired.
 The value is 0 thru one less than the number of referenced repeatable comments.

return.comment: the RefRepeatComment containing the referenced address and its referenced repeatable comment

methods.name: getReferencedRepeatableComments
methods.comment: Gets a referenced repeatable comment as a RefRepeatComment object.

params.name: refAddress
params.comment:
the reference address whose repeatable comment is desired.
 Note: there must be a reference from the address for this displayableEol to the refAddress.

return.comment: the comment lines for the referenced address's repeatable comment or null.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the automatic comment as an array.
@return the automatic comment
methods.name: getAutomaticComment
methods.comment: Gets the automatic comment as an array.

name: DisplayableEol
comment:
Utility class with methods to get comment information that can be displayed in the
 end of line comment field. A DisplayableEol is associated with a code unit.
 The DisplayableEol gets information for the EOL comment field, which can show the
 End of Line comment for the code unit, the Repeatable comment for the code unit,
 any repeatable comments for the code units that this code unit has references to, and
 possibly a comment indicating the data at a code unit that is referenced by this code unit.
